website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive bartender kit comes with a couple of booklets to get you started in mixology.
pros: Items include a muddler, double jigger, stainless steel shaker, and velvet bag for storage
Quality build for a low price
Extras include a pocket recipe booklet and a larger ebook filled with tips and recipes
cons: Some buyers report that the shaker leaks and the shaker top can easily get stuck
The muddler is too large to fit in the storage bag

customer_reviews.title: Great brand! Please read if you have trouble!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a relative but I have another shaker and the Barrillo pour spouts. This is a great brand!!! Others are having trouble getting the lids off of the shaker, here is the trick. Don’t jam the top on there real tight!! Just put it on a little bit and shake! Also if you take the small lid (On top of the strainer) off first the other will come off easier. But really , you don’t have to jam It on real tight, it won’t leak.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A.

customer_reviews.title: stuck
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for a dinner party i hosted and the main three parts locked when i tried making my first cocktail. i had two of my guests try opening it with no luck. now it is sitting in my kitchen sink, unable to be opened and full of what was supposed to me a margarita.
customer_reviews.author: JQK

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect purchase!!! This set came with everything I needed to make the perfect cocktail! Very sleek design and bonus cocktail recipe book, for which now I need to stock different liquors to try them all!!! Sucks to be me right!!! I highly recommend this shacker set!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: BARILLIO Elite Cocktail Shaker Set Bartender Kit - Review
customer_reviews.text: I have used my new shaker a few times so far, and so far I am very happy and have no complaints! The shaker holds a decent amount of volume for martinis and cosmos, which is really good. The main problem that I have had with other shakers is that the removable spout gets "welded together" with the top and you cannot remove it, even with adding hot water. I have read that this has a lifetime warranty, so if this ever happens to me with this shaker, Mr. Guy Shalit you can count on me contacting you for a full replacement!! Please LMK if you have any comments. Thanks, Anthony
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Everything looked good until I couldn't remove the lid
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black stainless shaker set and the lid is EXTREMELY hard to remove. I used it once and it was hard to remove. I used it a second time the next day and I was not able to remove the lid. Perhaps it needs to rest overnight. I would like to use it more than once per day.
customer_reviews.author: Chad B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid shaker!
customer_reviews.text: Great shaker with a precise and solid build. Does not leak, super easy to clean, with a great muddle stick and mixing/pouring spoon. I'll be grabbing another for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This set is classy, easy to use, and wash. It’s a beautiful addition to the bar. I will be gifting this to some friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Nice shaker set
customer_reviews.text: Received item exactly as pictured and described. Appears well made and I will put to use later tonight to make lemon drops. I like the velvet carrying pouch to hold everything for camping and overnight trips. A card was included with the item inviting to join the 'Barillio VIP Club' but was sadly a disappointment because there appeared to be a problem with the site. Therefore I was unable to 'sign-up' and score on recipes and discounts for other products. But the product itself is very satisfactory. UPDATE 4.22.19 I used this product to make lemon drops and it worked great! I am completely satisfied and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sirius1nWA

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This is my fitst bartender kit. I have only used it a few times, for now there are no leaks. The top is not so easy to put on, that's why I gave it 4 stars, but it doesn't leak so I will get use to it. Looks like it will hold up to weekly use, time will tell. Overall I am happy with this purchase. The quality is there, durability seems there, and the price is very fair. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nor

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t leak
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shaker as a gift everyone I have purchased was a different shaker, that’s because I didn’t want everyone to have the same one my sister loved this elite shaker this was her first time using one she looked at me and learned pretty fast so far she has used it everyday for her company,now I have to find 2 more she’s happy thanks
customer_reviews.author: alvina hunt

customer_reviews.title: Works, but color is very very bad now.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, the color is beautiful. I was very happy with this purchase. Unfortunately it tarnishes incredibly fast. It looks like very very old copper after just a couple weeks. I gave it 3 stars because it definitely does its job, just isn’t in a pretty roae gold looking tin anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kitkat2011

customer_reviews.title: One time and done! It’s metal! Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this shaker set, the box came damaged, already not giftable, so I thought I would keep it and the first time I used it the shaker lid is literally STUCK!! LIKE HORRIBLY STUCK! I’ve tried soap, I’ve tried hot water, cold water, Vaseline. It’s horrible, don’t bother, and I’m not wasting even more time and money to run it all the way to a kohl’s or ups or whatever, so the best thing I feel I can do is just let everyone know! Thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: Meriya B.

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Does what it claims. We've had it for a few weeks and have only used it once, but it worked great. The looks themselves are worth the price. It looks awesome on my bar top next to bottles. Only very small flaws, like no indicator on the jigger indicating the size but once you figure it out it's hard to forget. I think it's worth the price just for the looks alone. Came with some cool "bar tools" like a stirring spoon and a masher as well as some drink spouts. Overall well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: A.C

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on the 10th of September and received on the 12th (talk about fast shipping)! I received loads of compliments for a party that I served drinks for (September 26) and would have easily given a 5-star review. After washing the shaker with tools, the gold paint started to chip off *see attachments* and that’s only after being used roughly 5 hours. Definitely would not use/purchase again, due to the fact that the paint might chip off and land onto a drink.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for and the color is very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely boxed and each piece is wrapped individually. The booklet that comes along with the shaker and other items is nice and appears to be easy to read. I have not made any drinks yet...I can't imagine that the recipes are hard to follow, though. The top of the shaker is two pieces. The inner has a strainer lid and there is a solid cover for shaken drinks. The jigger is not marked for measurements but that is also easy to figure out. Overall, it is pretty on my bar and I look forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bar set. The metal isn't too thin and has no dents. All the parts fit together well. The finish on the stainless steel has no imperfections. The storage bag fits all the accessories too! I can't comment as to the longevity of the finish or if it rusts at this early date. With handwashing and thorough drying, I don't think their will be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: icnony

customer_reviews.title: The shaker doesn’t open back up. Stuck to each other.
customer_reviews.text: Not useful if you can’t use it. It was good while it lasted for 2 weeks and then the top of the shaker got stuck to the bottom part. Yes, it’s a good set and all but I cannot use it anymore. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Alice

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be of good quality and should last a long time. Can't really go wrong for $20. I've seen jiggers alone sell for half that. The recipe guide isn't really needed in the digital age. There are great apps for that. Can't wait to break it in.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well. Was nervous about the cap getting stuck after reading the reviews. But since you’re not supposed to screw the cap on, and when you shake you just apply pressure to the side not the top. Was able to make multiple drinks in one night. Also it’s not dishwasher safe, the instructions come with a “how to” wash it, lol. But yes it works great. It’s a smoky black not matte black. I bit silver on the edges but it’s very cool. Great price and works well! Now I just need a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and worth the cost, not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Has been functional for mixing drinks however the quality of the equipment is no where near the best but also definitely not the worst. A good middle of the pack gift that has some nice additions with the carry case and the recipe book. However the recipe book has various typos and grammatical errors that could have easily been removed with a quick reread.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Stellflue

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color of the product. It looked very nice. I also enjoyed the bag it came with which makes it easy to transport and also store everything in one place. I also thought it was nice that it came with all the little extras. Definitely an amazing product and a great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: ob

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine till strainer cap got stuck
customer_reviews.text: For 20 bucks this is not to bad, but after a couple weeks of use and regular cleaning the strainer cap is just about welded to the top. I have tried everything to get it off and nothing has worked, not a big deal I just have to strain Boston style but it's still an inconvenience. Most other parts of the kit are fine, pour spouts aren't as smooth as more expensive ones but that's not that big of a deal. 2 stars for the cap getting stuck really maybe I have a defective one, other than that it works fine for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Siegrist

customer_reviews.title: I hate headlines
customer_reviews.text: This set looks nice, and does the basics for cocktail mixing. However, after you shake the day lights out of this thing the twist lid is really difficult to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Lid got stuck
customer_reviews.text: While I absolutely loved how the product looked when first arriving, after using it for the third time tonight the lid got stuck and I have been unable to remove the top to use again. A little disappointing because I really wanted to love this product for the price. I emailed customer service so we’ll see if they can offer assistance
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Added a home bar/ liquor cabinet and this little kit it’s perfect for the counter top. Has everything you need to make a few cocktails. It’s enough to make it look like you know what your doing, but not over the top to make people think your an alcoholic lush with to much free time. Great to have to entertain or for personal use
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but pros and cons to the slender design. Still in all, a nice buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful construction and the added tools were nice especially the muddler. The jigger is OK and not ideal for professionals but it was a freebie so not a biggie. The bag is nice which I repurpose to hold my pour spouts in transport. The slender design make it fit well into other shaker tins but it can’t be used with other shaker tops due to its size.
customer_reviews.author: Augustine Pham

customer_reviews.title: Found another style opens easily
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set but it’s aluminum and my elderly parents were unable to open, after shaking. The lid was nearly impossible to remove by me age 55. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter set
customer_reviews.text: Just received this. Upon opening, the product is nice and clean, and seems very sturdy. Use over time will put that to the test. Nice that I can register the product online for free and receive lifetime warranty. The only potential problem is that the screws that hold the two halves of the jigger together are exposed. I’m expecting rust to accumulate in this area, but overall that’s not why I purchased the set, so I’m not too bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Elite Kit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cocktail shaker for an upcoming event. The product was packaged great and I was able to make a few margaritas. Perfect to travel with since it all fits in the shaker and it's bag. Definitely recommend. Also, came with some recipes to try.
customer_reviews.author: Unique_Shop

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: This was very scratched up when I opened up the box. I think it’s fair to say I was sent a used shaker. The plastic that should have been on the mixer, ice crushed, wine stoppers, and shaker were all stuffed at the bottom at the box, not around the merchandise. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works but low quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I loved the recipe book that came with it. The carrying bag looks nice as well. The product performs as intended. Cons: Product feels and looks a little cheap. The metal began to degrade and lose luster after just a few uses. The jig literally split in half when I accidentally dropped it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice build, can be hard to open
customer_reviews.text: It does have the feel of quality to it and is nice and sturdy, after it sits a little while in the closet it does get to the point where you will need a lot of strength to open the shaker, got to the point that I thought I will actually bend the shaker trying to open the cap, but aside from that it is a nice gift and has no cheap feel to it what so ever, lets say between my shakers this one is my favorite now
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home bar!
customer_reviews.text: My husband enjoys making cocktails at home and this has made things a lot easier for him. The size is perfect and it comes with just about every accessory that he needs. It looks very nice. The only two accessories that do not fit in the shaker for storage are the muddler and stirrer.
customer_reviews.author: Artery30

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This shaker kit is great! I’ve recently become a fan of mojitos and this is very helpful in preparing them. The lid does not leak when shaking and comes off with a light squeeze and twist. The color is gray/black and looks high end and expensive. Comes in a nice velvet bag for storage and travel.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is just amazing. It comes with everything I need to make a great drink including some fun recipes. Everything is in perfect condition and there even a cute little cover with it I am very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great till..
customer_reviews.text: It looks great. It needs something to keep all the small parts. That’s the only reason it won’t have 5 stars. I’ve lost parts and need to buy a new one. It’s my fault I get it but some of the comparable ones have a holder for the small parts.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Levinson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Cocktail Shaker for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a really easy to use shaker, perfect for beginners. Friends love coming over to my home for mixed drinks. I have had this product close to 7 months and lost the lid recently. SAVANTSYS were kind enough to send me the entire set again free of charge so I could continue mixing for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Lovepreet Thind

customer_reviews.title: Let the cocktail games begin!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally was pushed to getting a set. I joined up with a cocktail sub box, and needed a shaker and stirring spoon for one of the recipes with the 1st box. It came with a jigger, so now I have two. I like this set. Been getting a lot of use out of it. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Anubyss

customer_reviews.title: just the ticket
customer_reviews.text: The set arrived quickly, was well packaged, and the contents were as described. It is a good assortment of tools with just one caveat: would liked to have had a separate strainer included. The drinks primer was a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Mixer for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Typically a mixer set can be quite expensive. However, this set has all the essentials for a great low price. The copper coating can be maintained with lime juice (finger prints stay on but that's normal for copper). It was a gift for my sister in law and she absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: C.Tice

customer_reviews.title: Great for a DIY Cocktail Basket
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my cocktail basket. I kept all the little utensils inside the cocktail shaker to give room for the rest of the ingredients. The shaker was quite heavy, so I’m sure it’s durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for anyone that makes cocktails. It’s very easy to use and helps to make the perfect cocktails. I like to make martinis and cosmos and the jigger and shaker are perfect for those drinks. Everything looks really nice and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Quality high end shaker set without the high end price
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my bf. Came with all the parts as advertised and is great quality and looks great! I got the copper finish shaker set as it went better with his kitchen decor he was thrilled. Great for a house warming gift or for for a birthday gift. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to clean. Has everything I need to mix my drinks. I did order a Hawthorne strainer though. Much easier to remove than the strainer that comes with this. Everything else is great though.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter cocktail set!
customer_reviews.text: I like this set. It's easy to use it looks nice and feels like a good quality material. It comes with a little book to teach you some beginning mixed drinks. I like the shaker the best.
customer_reviews.author: JP Norritt

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking with a couple small flaws
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good set. The only issues is that the cup gets extremely cold when shaking with ice. Additionally the lid can be very difficult to get off. It does however look very nice and is a nice addition to a home bar.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter bar set. The tools have a heavy weight and feel good quality. The shaker is fine and does its purpose. The only issue I had and the reason I am giving 4 starts is that the 2 pieces in the shot jigger broke and came apart after first wash.
customer_reviews.author: Twes

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Set is decent looking and functional but not the highest quality. Everything barely fits (shaker, muddler, spoon) in the bag. If you are giving a gift or looking for something of a display piece, I would look elsewhere. If you just want something functional you can use to make cocktails, this will do.
customer_reviews.author: forcemage

customer_reviews.title: Frozen hands anyone?
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this set based on the reviews. But I had to let my hands defrost before I typed this. The shaker is one layer of stainless steel and when you’re shaking anything with ice, the entire shaker gets unbearably cold and frosted on the outside. No fun!! A two layer SS shaker would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline's Must Haves

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner kit at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Me and my roomie have a little bar stand we wanted something to mix drinks in so we got this and it hasn’t disappointed. Our friends think we’re real ass adults now, definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Hollister Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Cute set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for mixing martinis but I have since used it for a lot more. It cleans up very nicely and most importantly the lid on the shaker does not get stuck after you have made a drink.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: A great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a cocktail shaker that does not leak! I have been doing research to find a shaker that can be shaken and pours without leaks and spillage. Well, this is the one! The extras that come with this particular one are an extra bonus too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LES

customer_reviews.title: Shaker lid is impossible to get off
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t purchase this unless you happen to be the hulk. After making a cocktail with the cocktail shaker, the lid is close to impossible to get off. It takes the fun out of making cocktails when it takes two men and 30 minutes to be able to drink them.
customer_reviews.author: The mikulec

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shaker
customer_reviews.text: There isn’t anything wrong with this set by any means , not a huge deal, but just disappointed I ordered the black shaker and got a stainless steel one. Serves it’s purpose I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Rich McKenney

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened it up, from the looks it seems very nice and of good quality, I like how it is packaged within the box. Would make good present. One thing I am very unhappy about and think is a problem is that I ordered and wanted the black one and instead received the silver. I need/want to use it so don’t want to return it and lose time but it is very frustrating and unhappy to receive wrong item.
customer_reviews.author: Lance R

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, hard to take apart.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because I’m a bartender and wanted to experiment with drinks at home, as well as make my favorites. When it arrived I was so excited because it’s gorgeous! I did expect the black to be a little darker, but it’s still beautiful. Felt like I got a lot for the price. However I used it for the first time two days ago and I still have yet to get the lid off it’s so stuck... so I’m very frustrated that it’s looking like a one time use product to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla E

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because I wanted something that I could store and transport easily without managing a bunch of pieces and taking up a lot of space. I have had used this product for myself and friends everyday since receiving it, and I absolutely love it! the material is smooth and professional, and all of the products are durable! I would definitely bought for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Jaricka Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look of this set - it looks expensive! It is made of good, sturdy metal and it is easy to hold and shake! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Skj616

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I’m so excited about my purchase, while visiting Chicago, the bartender made this amazing drink and told me how to make it but I didn’t have a shaker so a I immediately ordered one and have been making it ever since thanks to my wonderful shaker!
customer_reviews.author: M. Jay Will

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and feels strurdy
customer_reviews.text: The shaker looks small but can hold 24oz of liquid right up to the brim. It looks nice and feels strurdy. The only thing I didnt like is that the top goes over the bottom making it a little harder to put the top on. I m not sure if it will hold up for long. Any sort of bend might make it so the top wont fit. I also feel the velvet bag that comes with it is a waste.
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD E PORTILLO

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff! Works perfect for mixing the occasional drink
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff! Works perfect for mixing the occasional drink. Maybe it's just me but it does tend to be a bit messy. Drink drips down the side after shaking when the top is removed.
customer_reviews.author: ccc_wood

customer_reviews.title: Stunning set
customer_reviews.text: My most favorite gift to myself during quarantine. This set is beautiful and makes cocktail hour so much more fun using pretty tools that are also great quality.
customer_reviews.author: bellewithab

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: A truly beautiful and functional cocktail set, with everything anyone could want for making drinks. It's all stainless steel, so it's dishwasher safe. The shaker itself has a nice snug lid so as not to leak. You even have the option to claim a couple free cocktail making e-books with your purchase. Overall, a great price for a great set of products.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Great Set with a Small Carrying Bag
customer_reviews.text: As an amateur mixer I love this set as it can be used as both a regular cocktail shaker and a boston style shaker (with the right size glass that is). Definitely have gotten some great drinks from it! Only downside is that the carrying bag provided does NOT have room for all the components. I can fit the small pieces inside the shaker and the stirring stick beside it outside, but the muddler will not fit without a fight. Not a huge deal I usually leave it out now, but just a warning!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: I am just starting to learn drink mixing and this has turned out to be the perfect set. It's easy to clean and I love the cap pour feature. The only thing is when the cup gets cold (after you shake it, it freezes) it's a little hard to separate but other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor W

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! I purchased this as a gift for a culinary student and it has been perfect. He loves it and has used it a lot for class already.
customer_reviews.author: MommyTysa

customer_reviews.title: Drink with mixers with wine corks
customer_reviews.text: Really cute sets I would have liked the car to be a little bigger definitely keeps things cold. let it hard to come off after shaking but that's a good thing because you know it's not going to leak
customer_reviews.author: Sandra E Scarlett-Bartee

customer_reviews.title: This is how you get your drink on.
customer_reviews.text: I mostly drink straight bourbon, but I bought this because I wanted a muddler for making Moscow Mules. It turns out to be a nice entry-level cocktail setup. Good quality, easy to clean, and my friends think I'm fancy now.
customer_reviews.author: Dmaniac278

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the product. Very well made and not cheap looking at all. I have not had the opportunity to use it but I can not wait until I do.
customer_reviews.author: By DON'T SETTLE FOR LESS $$$

customer_reviews.title: Great Set For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Easy to clean. Good sized for mixing cocktails. Like the bag to store it in (though it's hardly ever in it). The accessories are a nice addition to my home bar. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gowdy

customer_reviews.title: Would like Jigger to have quantity markings
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to bar tending. I would like the jigger to have the graduations listed on the side or inside. Other than that, so far it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: Doug H.

customer_reviews.title: Cocktail Shaker
customer_reviews.text: I especially enjoyed the fact that it came with so many accessories for a beginner to use. I am still discovering how to mix drinks and this purchase will go a long way to help.
customer_reviews.author: Darkknight1951

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than my other shakers
customer_reviews.text: The shaker was a little bit smaller than I thought it was going to be. But the cocktail tools are great add-ons. I didn't realize the pour stoppers came with the kit. Those have been a nice addition to our bar. Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Hinote

customer_reviews.title: Color Hurt
customer_reviews.text: its like purple not black brought it to match my housing and black bar accessories
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wrap... Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for a friend. He loves it! It was exactly what he was looking for any gift wise it was right in my budget!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Great quality overall. This would be my first mixer I ever buy and I’m impressed with the look and how sturdy each item is made. It really does look high end. The bag it comes with is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jesenda Castro

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to get this set at a good price, has a nice shiny gold to it and has everything I need, very easy to clean just follow the instructions So that you won’t scratch it
customer_reviews.author: Tashiarah

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for making my favorite margaritas!! It has everything a beginning home bartender needs to make wonderful cocktails but it's not too fancy or complex.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets super cold
customer_reviews.text: I like it .. however when you shake it with ice it's gets like super freaking cold and the top doesnt want to come off right away.... Not a big deal ... It's not a deal breaker or anything... I still like it!
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and the product is exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cocktail shaker and this one is made well and serves the purpose well. I like that it came with a muddle, stirrer and a two-sided shot glass for measuring. I'm very happy with the price point for what I got.
customer_reviews.author: GSC

customer_reviews.title: Black isn’t black. Nice set nonetheless
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Wasn’t Black like the ad showed, more of a dark grey/copper color, but it works well for my bar gigs
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for someone interested in making drinks
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as intended and is well made and definitely of quality. The cocktail shaker does not need to be forced together only a slight push is needed to seal it together, that way it wont get stuck. It will be perfect for the prohibition cocktails I plan on making this New year's eve.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turn yourself into an amateur bartender!
customer_reviews.text: I was intending to get this for a friend, but the package arrived looking pretty banged up. The contents inside were fine though. Nice little set to bring out your inner bartender
customer_reviews.author: Connie Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Shaker set works great and I got a free ebook of many cocktails! Cant wait to try some of these out!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Freeze to pop apart if stuck
customer_reviews.text: Don't be like me. Make sure to separate the too from the base while still frozen, otherwise you'll never get it off. Pop in the freezer if you forget and it comes apart easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: A bar necessity
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set that has all the necessary pieces. It is not truly black as I thought, but it is still very nice and is a little different from the plain silver. I gave it as a gift and I know the recipient has used it many times and also appreciated the e-book that we received later. That was a pleasant surprise that we were not expecting. I really love this company!! Great customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: It's a gift
customer_reviews.text: It's a gift for my husband, so he hasn't had a chance to try it out. But it looks great, exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Lane

customer_reviews.title: Durable and well made! Pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great bartender kit! Purchased for my son for Christmas. Nice looking and well made. Very pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Campione

customer_reviews.title: Nice shaker
customer_reviews.text: My first order came with a rust/chip and they replaced with ease. The shaker itself was nice. This was a gift to a friend, and I haven't heard any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: BBB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, came with a charming velvet bag and a recipe guide.
customer_reviews.author: Renan M.

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret getting this item.  Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Great for entertainment of guests, making delicious drinks and muddled fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Rita J.

customer_reviews.title: Elite shaker set
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this set. Cleaning is a snap plus it all fits into the soft quick close bag.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shaker. Doesn’t get stuck together like a lot of other ones do. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lopez

customer_reviews.title: sticky situation
customer_reviews.text: Its really pretty. But good luck having your second or third drink. The lid sticks like no other. I had to return. I'm glad I didn't gift it to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Jsulpiz

customer_reviews.title: Works great but hard to get apart
customer_reviews.text: I'm having a real hard time getting the two pieces to disconnect from each other. The seal is great for making your cocktails but when you have to spend over 5 minutes getting it to come apart it isn't so great.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Digital

customer_reviews.title: All the basics in a nice package
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my purchase. I'm not a big drinker so the basics are all I require for the cocktails I plan to mix.
customer_reviews.author: Todd K

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Let the One Star Reviews Scare You.  Great Product for the Price!!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid to buy this after reading the one star reviews about the lid sticking but after a few uses everything is working perfectly. Great quality product for the price. Only down side for me is the pouring spouts don’t fit my liquor bottles as I tend to buy the handles and not the smaller bottles. So if you only buy the larger bottles don’t expect them to fit.
customer_reviews.author: christine nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this set, bought for a friend who is a bartender. Delivery time was great and the companie's interest in my feedback made this purchase worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: tony way

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good. The only consideration is the presentation. The box was broken and with scratches like if it were used.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cocktail Shaker Set
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I wanted to upgrade our bar tools and this set was a great addition. It is easy to clean and easy to use. We have taken our drink making to the next level.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Alan Leafman

product_meta.title: Elite Cocktail Shaker Set Bartender Kit by BARILLIO: 24 oz Stainless Steel Martini Mixer, Muddler, Mixing Spoon, jigger, 2 liquor pourers, Velvet Bag, Recipes Booklet & eBook
feature_bullets: SERVE YOUR GUESTS WITH STYLE: BARILLIO COCKTAIL SHAKER SET ANSWERS ALL YOUR NEEDS! » No more purchasing unnecessary bar accessories you'll never use. BARILLIO provides most essential bar accessories you need for mixing delicious cocktails & mocktails without any fuss or mess: 24 ounce SST Cobbler shaker, mojito muddler, mixing spoon, double-jigger, 2 liqour pourers. BONUS: velvet bag for storage and a cute pocket booklet with yummy cocktail recipes.

TOP MATERIALS: RUSTPROOF & DISHWASHER SAFE » Our superior design products undergoes restricted inspection in the U.S. Barillio Martini Shaker features a high-grade inner which does not leech harmful chemicals nor affect your beverages’ flavors. You can dish-wash your utensils and keep their shine with ease.

BONUS - VELVET BAG FOR STORAGE & TRAVEL » We know There is nothing more frustrating than searching for your bar tools while you have no idea where you put them. The smooth velvet bag will keep your cocktail shaker and accessories clean between uses and prevent it from getting scratched up. Perfect for carrying the whole cocktail set to friends and parties.

EBOOK & BOOKLET » LEARN TO THINK LIKE A BARTENDER! The eBook "Happy Hour" is a digital copy, so you can access it from your phone anywhere you go. Learn new techniques, tips and recipes! For beginners there is also a pocket-sized booklet with recipes. Your Mojito and Martini will taste as if it was made at a bar by real bartenders :).
MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE » We are totally confident with our products quality therefore your purchase will be backed by a 100% lifetime satisfaction guarantee. NO QUESTIONS ASKED.
